text: Apani ki bhebe dekhenani, yaderake kanaghusa karate nisedha kara hayechila atahpara tara nisid'dha kajera'i punarabrtti kare ebam papacara, simalanghana ebam rasulera abadhyatara bisaye'i kanaghusa kare. Tara yakhana apanara kache ase, takhana apanake emana bhasaya salama kare, yaddbara allaha apanake salama karenani. Tara mane mane baleh amara ya bali, tajjan'ye allaha amaderake sasti dena na kena? Jahannama'i tadera jan'ye yathesta. Tara tate prabesa karabe. Kata'i na nikrsta se'i jayaga.
